content:
If the person declines to tell me how they are voting, do I enter nothing?
If they tell me they've registered in another state, can I capture that?
If they tell me they're the right person and THEN hang up, how do I code that?
Thx
Hi Jeff, if they declined, mark as refused. if they're registered in another state mark them as moved. if the right person hangs up, mark it as hang up
Thank you. Didn't see a refused button, but will dive back in and look. Appreciate the quick response.
